Summary._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  [M] No trains between Essex St and Broadway Junction [J] Trains provide alternate service

Description._: TRACK REPLACEMENT  [M] No trains between Essex St and Broadway Junction [J] Trains provide alternate service

LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK REPLACEMENT</i><br clear=left>[M] No trains between Essex St and Broadway Junction<br clear=left>[J] Trains provide alternate service</b>Weekends, 6:15 AM to 11:45 PM, Saturday, Jan 20, 27 <i>and </i>Feb 3<br>                   8 AM to 10 PM, Sunday, Jan 21, 28 <i>and</i> Feb 4<br><br>No [M] service at <b>Broadway Junction</b>, <b>Halsey St</b>, <b>Gates Av</b>, <b>Kosciuszko St</b>, <b>Myrtle Av</b>, <b>Flushing Av</b>,<br><b>Lorimer St</b>, <b>Hewes St</b>, <b>Marcy Av</b> and <b>Essex St</b>.<br><br>For service <i>to/from</i> these stations take the [J]* instead.<br><br><i>*Please review [J] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip.<br><br></i><b>Reminder:</b> [M] Shuttle train operates <i>all times</i> between <b>Metropolitan Av</b> and <b>Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs<br></b>and [SB] free shuttle buses operate between <b>Myrtle-Wyckoff Av</b> and <b>Myrtle Av</b>.<br><b><br>

Summary._: STATION ENHANCEMENTS  [N] Astoria-bound trains skip 39 Av and Broadway

Description._: STATION ENHANCEMENTS  [N] Astoria-bound trains skip 39 Av and Broadway

LongDescription: <b><i>STATION ENHANCEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[N] Astoria-bound trains skip 39 Av and Broadway</b>Weekends, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, until Jan 29<br><br>For service<i> to</i> these stations, take the [N] to Astoria Blvd and transfer to a<br>Coney Island-bound [N].<br><br>For service<i> from </i>these stations, take the [N] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer<br>to an Astoria-bound [N].<br><br><b>Note:</b> 36 Av and 30 Av are closed for renovation.<br><b><br>

Summary._: STATION IMPROVEMENTS  [Q] 96 St-bound trains run via the [R] from DeKalb Av to Canal St

Description._: STATION IMPROVEMENTS  [Q] 96 St-bound trains run via the [R] from DeKalb Av to Canal St

LongDescription: <b><i>STATION IMPROVEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[Q] 96 St-bound trains run via the [R] from DeKalb Av to Canal St</b></font>Weekend, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Jan 19 - 22<br><br>Trains stop at Jay St-MetroTech, Court, Whitehall, Rector, Cortlandt Sts and City Hall.<br><br> Please allow additional travel time.<br><b><br>

Summary._: STATION IMPROVEMENTS   [R] Forest Hills-bound trains run express from 59 St, Brooklyn to Canal St via the Manhattan Bridge

Description._: STATION IMPROVEMENTS   [R] Forest Hills-bound trains run express from 59 St, Brooklyn to Canal St via the Manhattan Bridge

LongDescription: <b><i>STATION IMPROVEMENTS</i><br clear=left></font>[R] Forest Hills-bound trains run express from 59 St, Brooklyn to Canal St via the Manhattan Bridge</b><a href=http://advisory.mtanyct.info/pdf_files/ServiceGuide.pdf target=_blank><font color=#0000FF>Weekend</font></a>, Saturday <i>and</i> Sunday, Jan 20 - 21<br><br>Trains stop at 36 St and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.<br><br></font>For service <i>to</i> <b>53</b> and <b>45 Sts</b>, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [R] to 59 St and transfer to a Forest Hills-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> <b>25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St </b>and <b>Union St, </b>take the [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br>For service<i> from</i> these stations, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Forest Hills-bound [R].<br><br>For <b>DeKalb Av</b>, <b>Jay St-MetroTech</b>, <b>Court</b>, <b>Whitehall</b>, <b>Rector</b>, <b>Cortlandt Sts</b> and <b>City Hall</b>, <br>take the [Q]* instead.<br> Transfer between <b>[R]</b> and <b>[Q]</b> trains at <b>Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr</b> or<b> Canal St</b>.<br><br></font><i>*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.<br><br></i><table class=plannedworkTableStyle  border=1 cellspacing=1 cellpadding=5 rules=none frame=box><td>  [ad]  <td><font size=1>This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning<br>your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  </font></table><br><b><br>
